title: LioCollyVibeThunder PWA installability + in-app install/help screen

requirements.summary: Add a dedicated Help / Install page with iOS/Android browser install steps and a clear note about separate store packaging requirements.
acceptanceCriteria: A new page is accessible via a route in the app (e.g., from a visible link/button in the UI)
The page includes step-by-step install instructions for iOS Safari (Add to Home Screen) and Android Chrome (Install app / Add to Home Screen)
The page includes a clear note that publishing to Apple App Store / Google Play Store requires a separate native wrapper and store submission process not performed by this web deployment

file_operations.description: Create a new Help / Install page containing English step-by-step instructions for iOS Safari and Android Chrome installation, plus a clear disclaimer that App Store / Play Store publishing requires separate native wrapping and submission outside this web build. Also include a small visual section that uses the generated icon set image at frontend/public/assets/generated/feature-icons.dim_256x256.png to satisfy the projectâ€™s generated-asset wiring requirement.
Register a new TanStack Router route (e.g., /help or /install) that renders HelpInstallPage, ensuring the page is navigable within the existing route tree.

Add a visible link/button in the app UI (e.g., in the header next to the app title or near the AuthButton) that navigates to the new Help / Install route so users can find installation instructions easily.

requirements.summary: Make the app installable as a PWA via a web app manifest, icon assets, and required HTML meta/link tags.
acceptanceCriteria: A web app manifest file exists and is linked from the app HTML entry point
The manifest defines app name, short name, start URL, display mode, theme/background colors, and includes icon entries with common sizes
The HTML entry point includes required PWA links/meta (manifest link, theme-color, and Apple touch icon / capability tags)
On a mobile browser, the app is eligible for installation (browser shows install option when criteria are met)

file_operations.description: Add a web app manifest that defines the app name/short_name, start_url, display mode (standalone), theme_color and background_color, and icon entries referencing the PWA icon assets (including common sizes like 192x192 and 512x512).
Add a 192x192 PWA icon asset (derived from branding). This file must be referenced by frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest.
Add a 512x512 PWA icon asset (derived from branding). This file must be referenced by frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest.
Add an Apple touch icon (180x180) for iOS home screen installation. This file must be referenced by link tags in frontend/index.html.

Wire PWA install metadata into the HTML entry: add the manifest link tag, a theme-color meta tag, and iOS-specific tags (apple-touch-icon link and Apple web app capability/status bar meta tags) so iOS and Android browsers recognize the app as installable.

requirements.summary: Ensure required generated brand images exist under frontend/public/assets/generated and are used in the UI (logo in header and hero banner on discovery page).
acceptanceCriteria: The following files exist at frontend/public/assets/generated and load without 404s: app-logo.dim_512x512.png and hero-banner.dim_1600x900.png
The discovery hero banner renders using /assets/generated/hero-banner.dim_1600x900.png

file_operations.description: Ensure the generated app logo asset exists at the exact path frontend/public/assets/generated/app-logo.dim_512x512.png so it can be served as a static file without 404s.
Ensure the generated hero/banner asset exists at the exact path frontend/public/assets/generated/hero-banner.dim_1600x900.png so it can be served as a static file without 404s.
Ensure the generated feature icon set asset exists at the exact path frontend/public/assets/generated/feature-icons.dim_256x256.png for static serving and for use in the UI where appropriate.
Confirm and (if needed) update the header logo image reference to use the exact required path /assets/generated/app-logo.dim_512x512.png to satisfy the header-logo acceptance criteria.
Confirm and (if needed) update the hero banner image reference to use the exact required path /assets/generated/hero-banner.dim_1600x900.png to satisfy the discovery-hero acceptance criteria.
